name: v0.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Move loop-invariant offset calculation outside loop by @adlerjohn in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/35
* Automatic removal of orphan nodes by @tzdybal in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/24
* Fetch values immediately, updates by @adlerjohn in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/39
* Improve treeHasher performance by @cuonglm in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/42
* Fix wrong link to Libra whitepaper by @cuonglm in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/44
* Rebrand by @adlerjohn in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/46
* Error handling before logic in HasDescend by @adlerjohn in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/50
* Add fuzz package for running go-fuzz by @cuonglm in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/51
* fuzz: add .Delete fuzzing by @odeke-em in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/52
* Update coverage badge by @liamsi in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/53
* fuzz: return nil if len(keys) is zero by @odeke-em in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/55
* sanityCheck: only calculate siblingHash if necessary, refactor and reduce code nesting by @odeke-em in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/57
* Minor improvements by @liamsi in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/60
* Remove wishlist from readme by @musalbas in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/63
* Create CHANGELOG.md, CHANGELOG-PENDING.md, and corresponding GH action by @jbowen93 in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/66
* Remove changelog checker in favor of automatic on release. by @adlerjohn in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/68

## New Contributors
* @cuonglm made their first contribution in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/42
* @odeke-em made their first contribution in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/52
* @jbowen93 made their first contribution in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/66

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add Delete and Has methods to SparseMerkleTree by @tzdybal in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/12
* Fix typos and exported function docstrings by @adlerjohn in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/15
* Set proof's NonMembershipLeafData to nil for membership proofs by @adlerjohn in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/17
* Fix non-idiomatic error check by @adlerjohn in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/18
* Migrate to GitHub actions by @tzdybal in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/23
* Fix proof direction and key bit order by @adlerjohn in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/22
* Modernize error handling by @tzdybal in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/21
* Make branches updatable with sibling node value by @adlerjohn in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/27
* Fix CI by @adlerjohn in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/32
* Remove arm64 from test CI by @adlerjohn in https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/pull/33


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/celestiaorg/smt/compare/v0.1.1...v0.2.0
